attributes.action: Reduce Fuel Tax on Petrol and Diesel
attributes.additional_details: At present, Britain is one of the highest taxed on fuel across the EU and the world. Prices continue to rise, and wages remain static, and this is causing great strain on everyday life. Please sign this petition, to reduce fuel tax, even temporarily, to ease the strain on everyday life that many are currently feeling

rejection.details: A petition already exists asking for support for this subject matter.
